tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE WrestlerStatistics (
  wrestler_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  wrestler_name VARCHAR(255),
  win_count INT,
  loss_count INT,
  finishing_moves TEXT,
  match_duration INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE WrestlerMatches (
    wrestler_id INT NOT NULL,
    opponent_id INT NOT NULL,
    result VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    finishing_move VARCHAR(50),
    match_duration INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (wrestler_id, opponent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WrestlerDetails (
    wrestler_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    wrestler_weight INT,
    wrestler_height INT,
    wrestler_birthdate DATE
);
CREATE TABLE wrestler (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), weight_class VARCHAR(50), height FLOAT, birthdate DATE);
CREATE TABLE match (id INT PRIMARY KEY, wrestler1_id INT, wrestler2_id INT, winner_id INT, duration INT, match_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE finishers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, wrestler_id INT, finisher_name VARCHAR(255), description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE win_loss_record (id INT PRIMARY KEY, wrestler_id INT, wins INT, losses INT, draws INT);
CREATE TABLE promotions (id INT PRIMARY KEY, promotion_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(100), established_date DATE);
